segments.text: What are you doing for Christmas this year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All my relatives are getting together at my house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . M OST of my family is coming home too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who can't make it in your family ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My sister.She is going to her in-law's house this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's too bad . So , what did you ask for Christmas this year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I asked Santa to bring me a new sweater and some computer games .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want some computer games also . I gave my parents a really long Christmas list .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope that I get what I asked for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what does your family do on Christmas Day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We wake up early and go to church.Then we come back home and open our gifts together . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our family is a little different . We go to church on Christmas Eve instead .
segments.speaker: S2
